item.title: Photographer Who Discovered Vital Clue in Spain Train Crash Sparked Media ‘Firestorm’ - PetaPixel
item.description: Photographer Who Discovered Vital Clue in Spain Train Crash Sparked Media ‘Firestorm’ PetaPixelHow a Photographer Stumbled Upon a Key Picture of the Spain Train Crash The New York TimesSpain’s deadly rail accidents prompt maintenance investment debate ReutersSpain rocked by second rail tragedy in days: Barcelona passenger train derails after dozens killed in southern collision CNNSpain: Train collides with crane in wake of 2 deadly crashes &nb…
